'''Malignant Illness''' ''(unofficial name)'' is Chapter 14 of the ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' [[manga]]. It has not yet been localized in English.

==Summary==
[[Barnabas]] attempts to draw out the Archon residue inside [[Collei]], but Amber steps up to stop the man herself.
